2748.verse: ۞ وَلَوْ|And if|99|109|179$رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ|We had mercy on them|174|194|12345$وَكَشَفْنَا|and We removed|131|151|12346$مَا|what|53|73|262$بِهِم|(was) on them|117|137|125$مِّن|of|50|60|53$ضُرٍّ|(the) hardship,|119|157|8044$لَّلَجُّواْ|surely they would persist|186|262|12347$فِى|in|48|124|89$طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ|their transgression|143|181|127$يَعْمَهُونَ|wandering blindly.|138|138|128$

2749.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily|85|94|640$أَخَذْنَـٰهُم|We seized them|125|143|5592$بِٱلْعَذَابِ|with the punishment|155|173|12135$فَمَا|but not|69|87|132$ٱسْتَكَانُواْ|they submit|101|119|3351$لِرَبِّهِمْ|to their Lord|102|111|12348$وَمَا|and not|71|286|46$يَتَضَرَّعُونَ|they supplicate humbly|173|388|5583$

2751.verse: وَهُوَ|And He|67|84|305$ٱلَّذِىٓ|(is) the One Who|134|168|138$أَنشَأَ|produced|81|115|6102$لَكُمُ|for you|67|101|196$ٱلسَّمْعَ|the hearing|95|129|8133$وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ|and the sight|113|130|8134$وَٱلْأَفْــِٔدَةَ‌ۚ|and the feeling;|125|171|10072$قَلِيلاً|little|63|155|433$مَّا|(is) what|80|172|262$تَشْكُرُونَ|you give thanks.|130|176|508$

2752.verse: وَهُوَ|And He|67|85|305$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|171|138$ذَرَأَكُمْ|multiplied you|110|147|12350$فِى|in|48|85|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|129|100$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|109|2165$تُحْشَرُونَ|you will be gathered.|159|159|1795$

2753.verse: وَهُوَ|And He|67|74|305$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|148|138$يُحْىِۦ|gives life|78|92|2306$وَيُمِيتُ|and causes death|138|152|2307$وَلَهُ|and for Him|95|109|5732$ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ|(is the) alternation|145|152|12351$ٱلَّيْلِ|(of) the night|110|152|1418$وَٱلنَّهَارِ‌ۚ|and the day.|105|190|1419$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|190|452$تَعْقِلُونَ|you reason?|100|142|453$

2755.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|96|101$أَءِذَا|"What! When|107|121|9334$مِتْنَا|we are dead|102|116|12352$وَكُنَّا|and become|100|114|6992$تُرَابًا|dust|66|80|12280$وَعِظَـٰمًا|and bones,|97|111|12281$أَءِنَّا|would we|82|89|9336$لَمَبْعُوثُونَ|surely be resurrected?|168|168|10391$

2756.verse: لَقَدْ|Verily,|61|68|3466$وُعِدْنَا|we have been promised|176|190|12353$نَحْنُ|[we]|62|76|103$وَءَابَآؤُنَا|and our forefathers|148|162|12354$هَـٰذَا|this|59|73|248$مِن قَبْلُ|before;|92|106|250$إِنْ|not|44|51|225$هَـٰذَآ|(is) this|71|118|248$إِلَّآ|but|42|135|86$أَسَـٰطِيرُ|(the) tales|94|187|5506$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people)."|189|236|5507$

2748.verse: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.

2749.verse: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]

2750.verse: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.

2751.verse: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.

2752.verse: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.

2753.verse: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?

2754.verse: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.

2755.verse: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

2756.verse: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."

2757.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"

2758.verse: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"

2759.verse: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"

2760.verse: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"

2761.verse: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"

2762.verse: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
